title: Lenovo announces new IdeaPads and tablets with 12th-gen Intel CPUs
content:
Lenovo has a ton of announcements coming out of MWC 2022, and among them are a handful of new laptops geared towards consumers under the IdeaPad brand. The new Lenovo IdeaPad devices are powered by 12th-generation Intel processors, and they’re mostly convertibles running either Windows 11 or Chrome OS. There’s also a new iteration of

The post Lenovo announces new IdeaPads and tablets with 12th-gen Intel CPUs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo has announced a handful of IdeaPads running Windows 11 and Chrome OS at this year's MWC. There's also a new Android tablet.
